events.text: I hear there is a princess up top, but I wouldn't know for sure, I never made it up there.
You can use [color=#00FFFF][b]Spacebar[/b][/color] to jump, the longer you hold the farther you'll go. But be warned, once you're in the air you'll be unable to affect your movement, just like irl!
Good luck! [i] Tip: If you jump towards a wall while standing next to it, you'll slide up against it instead of crashing into it (like a mirror in real Jump King). Bug = feature LULE [/i]
